verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
His name is Wonderful
His name is Wonderful
His name is Wonderful
Jesus my Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He is the mighty King
Master of ev'rything
His name is Wonderful
Jesus my Lord

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He's the Great Shepherd
The rock of all ages
The Almighty God is He
Bow down before Him
Love and adore Him
His name is Wonderful
Jesus my Lord
